name: Shark Escape!
description:
Swim away from the Shark and don't let it get to close! (Or you might get bit)

Collect trash from the ocean and trade it in for upgrades in the shop.

Use boosts and extra hearts to help you survive from the shark and make sure to collect air bubbles so you don't run out of air while you're down in the depths!

Controls are listed in game, but here they are anyways:

W and S to move up and down

Left Shift to use boosts
